CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
C is very into playing; mumbles a lot to herself; video of M-C play begins in middle of free play; end of segment seems cut off too

u.a: <bef> M and C separately manipulate dishes and toys
C picks up small pitcher with lid
C leans down to pick up something she dropped
C reaches for something near M
M looks around floor near table
C sets a plate on table
C holds up a toy for M to see
M leans closer to C to see toy
C lets M take toy to look at
M gives toy back to C
C stops M from moving dishes
M lifts utensils and containers up as she speaks
C holds up toy table from house
M moves dishes out of C's way
tape breaks with Examiner in room to change toys
C is turning pages of book and "reading"; M looks on
C closes book and reaches for another
C points at a few places on opposite page
M leans forward to look carefully at picture she originally pointed to
M points at a picture on the page
M moves nursery rhyme book away; picks up first book
C moans and covers book with her body
M taps finger on a picture
C takes book and turns pages; "reading"
M is trying to point at pictures
C holds up book for M to look
C puts book away; gets nursery rhyme book again
M points to a different picture
M turns page; C groans and turns a bunch together
C turns a lot of pages
C turns a few pages to the end
M starts to turn a page back; C puts her hand on pages to stop her
M points at picture on book cover
C takes book from M and closes it
